metadata.description: Cursed at birth with extraordinary bad luck, Charlene ''Chuck'' Manchester provides disaster where someone else can profit. Got a failing business? Contact Chuck, and before you know it, you're collecting that insurance policy without ever getting your own hands dirty. But after a crime boss hires her to take out an evangelical cult, the mob boss, the cult leader, and a dogged insurance-fraud investigator all come for her at once. Collects issues #1–#4 of the miniseries.
metadata.name: Bad Luck Chuck
